name: unalleviated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something bad such as pain or a problem is unalleviated, nothing happens to make it less severe: The last few months have been a time of unalleviated misery for us. The dull plot is unalleviated by any moments of humour. Related word
alleviate
More examplesFewer examplesThis job has brought me nothing but unalleviated stress.Their wretched lives were unalleviated by decent healthcare or schooling.No one should be expected to put up with so much unalleviated suffering.She could see nothing ahead but unalleviated sorrow.
